content:
I apologize for the confusion. I see that you do have `max-height` set on the `img` selector, but the value you have specified is only 10%, which is quite low.

To limit the height of images, you may want to set `max-height` to a larger value. For example, if you want to limit the height to 200 pixels, you could set it to `max-height: 200px;`.

Also, note that setting `max-height` on the `img` selector limits the height of all images within the `.card` class, so if you have other images with different height requirements, you may need to create a separate class for those images and set `max-height` on that class instead.
